titles.title: U.S.-Israel Cybersecurity Center of Excellence Act
U.S.-Israel Cybersecurity Center of Excellence Act
A bill to require the Secretary of State to submit a report on potential benefits and impact to the United States of establishing a joint United States-Israel cybersecurity center of excellence.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
U.S.-Israel Cybersecurity Center of Excellence Act
This bill requires the Department of State to report on the potential benefits and impact of establishing a joint U.S.-Israel Cybersecurity Center of Excellence to leverage the knowledge of institutions and entities for the purposes of cybersecurity and protecting critical infrastructure.
